help-file.title: "LEGEND LORE"
help-file.content:
Syntax: examine <object> | <victim>
Long hours and intense study of the equipment and races within the realms has given the Minstrel a much higher ability to understand and ascertain the origins and makings of a things and people. This ability has risen to the levels of the mystical 'identify' spell of the conjurer.
Legend Lore success is dependant upon skill proficiency and may require several examinations before proper identification and analysis is made.
